overview: An apocalypse unexpectedly strikes Boston and forces our two main characters inside of a movie theater. They face a dire ultimatum: One of them wants to leave to confront the unknown and one of them wants to stay.  “Apple Cinema” is the first movie created for Boston by someone from Boston. This film features a Boston-based cast, crew, locations, sets, concepts, and plot.”
tagline: This is not your traditional Boston movie.
title: Apple Cinema
